title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8139.15 - Town of Orangetown
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8139.15 - Town of Orangetown

State Regulations
(a) Mountainview Road. Mountainview Road between Route 303 and Greenbush Road, a
distance of 0.1+- mile in the Town of Orangetown. (b) Greenbush Road. Greenbush Road between

Mountview Road and the Nice Pak Co. Facility, a distance of 0.1+- mile in the

Town of Orangetown. (c) North

Middletown Road. The northbound and southbound roadways of North Middletown

Road between Route 304, SH 1009, entrance/exit ramps and Lederle Laboratories, a distance of 0.2+- mile in the Town of Orangetown. (d) Oak Tree Road. Oak Tree Road, from Route
303 to the Consolidated Freightways terminal, a distance of 0.3+-
mile. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8139.15

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
